name: Custom Capstone: Cryptography
body:
### What is this project?
This project is an open-source file encryption and decryption tool developed by Nandan T, a high school senior. The application is cross-platform, and can deal with files of any file type.

### Authors and Contributors
@nt1st created and maintains this project
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
